title: Nonlinear Instructional Method-Based Physical Education and Sports Coaching Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theory and practical experience in physical education or sports coaching, proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners, as organizational physical education program managers or sports team leaders, aim to enhance flexible training design and execution skills through constraint-led approaches

learning_goals: Propose three or more concrete strategies for designing training environments (tasks, individuals, environments) using constraint-led approaches
Integrate principles of nonlinear pedagogy (perception-cognition-action interaction) into actual coaching scenarios for explanatory implementation
Establish a real-time constraint adjustment and feedback system using mobile learning tools
Quantitatively analyze adaptive performance behavior changes in learners through formative assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
